channel.title: Requesting Varrock South-East Iron Miner & Banker
channel.description:
I need a Varrock South-East Iron Miner & Banker. So this is what i need it to do:
1. Start at Varrock East Bank. 2. Then will check pick-axe if in inventory or wielding. 3. Will set to run 4. Walk down to Varrock South East Mine. 5. Start mining iron. 6. Once inventory full, it will return to the Varrock East bank. 7. Then access bank account. Right-Click on the iron ores each and select store. 8. Once stored will go back to Varrock South East Mine. 9. If pick-axe head falls off, it will find it and click on it. 10. Will continue mining iron. 11. If Mysterious old man appears, it will answer him. 12. If genie appears it will answer him. 13. If any other random person appears it will talk to them. 14. It will auto talk at random times
I'm willing to pay 200k for this script.
Thank-you (Who made one), Dudeofthed.

item.title: Requesting Varrock South-East Iron Miner & Banker
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Looks like that there are people these days that can’t be bothered.

(I just read through tutorial through tutorial and they all make no sense tro me as i have never ever created one scar script before)

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting Varrock South-East Iron Miner & Banker
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

I need a Varrock South-East Iron Miner & Banker.
So this is what i need it to do:

  1. Start at Varrock East Bank.
  2. Then will check pick-axe if in inventory or wielding.
  3. Will set to run
  4. Walk down to Varrock South East Mine.
  5. Start mining iron.
  6. Once inventory full, it will return to the Varrock East bank.
  7. Then access bank account. Right-Click on the iron ores each and select store.
  8. Once stored will go back to Varrock South East Mine.
  9. If pick-axe head falls off, it will find it and click on it.
  10. Will continue mining iron.
  11. If Mysterious old man appears, it will answer him.
  12. If genie appears it will answer him.
  13. If any other random person appears it will talk to them.
  14. It will auto talk at random times

I’m willing to pay 200k for this script.

Thank-you (Who made one),
Dudeofthed.

Read full topic
item.source: Requesting Varrock South-East Iron Miner & Banker
